product_name: Wilderness Press Pacific Crest Trail Data Book - 5th Edition
long_description: Whether you're thru-hiking the entire 2,663 miles or taking it one section at a time, the updated. Author: Benedict "Gentle Ben" Go. Softcover, 128 pages, black-and-white photographs and maps. Wilderness Press; copyright 2013. Provides mileage, landmarks, facilities, re-supply data and essential trail information for the entire Pacific Crest Trail from Mexico to Canada. Provides information essential for pre-trip planning; ideal for both north- and south-bound hikers. Helps you set daily mileage goals by listing campsites, water sources, trail gradient and facilties, and helps you easily calculate distances between any two points. A thin volume you can stash in your pack for easy reference,.
short_description: Whether you're thru-hiking the entire 2,663 miles or taking it one section at a time, the updated Pacific Crest Trail Data Book offers essential trail information to help you plan and prepare.
